page.title: 17ENTERTAINMENT. RECREATION
page.content: Public Houses. There are five, one offering live entertainment on Saturday evenings. Clubs. Social Club offers darts,cards, snooker,bowls and tennis.The local firm of Plysu have a sports and social club for their employees. There are many associated groups connected with the churches who are interested in community care. Woburn Sands Silver Band meet regularly for practice and perform in concerts all over the district. They also travel abroad to give concerts. Evening Classes in lace-making woodwork,languages,cookery,yoga,keep fit and badminton are organised.The young can attend Cubs, Scouts, Brownies, Guides and Boys Brigade. There are two Schools of Dancing which offer Ballet, Tap and Stage in the curriculum.
